title: Product Experience Interview
context: Understanding how users experience our product, identifying pain points, and discovering opportunities for improvement. This is a sample interview for testing the interview agent framework.

questions.base_question_text: Can you walk me through how you first discovered and started using this type of product? What was that initial experience like?
questions.research_objective: Understand the user's journey to adoption - what triggered their need, how they found solutions, and their first impressions

questions.base_question_text: What are the main tasks or goals you're trying to accomplish when you use products like this?
questions.research_objective: Identify primary use cases and jobs-to-be-done that drive product usage

questions.base_question_text: Can you tell me about a time when using a product like this worked really well for you? What made that experience great?
questions.research_objective: Understand what 'success' looks like from the user's perspective and identify key value drivers

questions.base_question_text: On the flip side, have you experienced any frustrations or limitations? What got in your way?
questions.research_objective: Identify pain points, friction, and unmet needs that represent improvement opportunities

questions.base_question_text: If you could wave a magic wand and change one thing about how these products work, what would it be?
questions.research_objective: Surface latent needs and desires that users may not have explicitly articulated before
